answers.answer: Are you using the Amino Acid protocol? The head thing will improve over time ..... but it will happen faster if you give your body some help with nutrition.... check out the Amino Acid Protocol listed in the health discussion box on right hand side of page. And keep yourself well hydated - people forget how fast we can lose enough fluids to be a problem. You may want some extra potassium about now also .... get some banannas and snack on those.... This too, shall pass - and you will have your head back before long .....
I call it mentalpause .....:) I had it as well It does get better supplements and vitamins do help.....avis

I too am a big fan of the aminos... but I had the confusion too... I guess there is some rewiring to be done in our brains (easiest way I can say it LOL)It should get better soon....if not I would see a doctor...but I think your body is just adjusting right now to no drugs...you know?Take Care...You are doing great!JoAnn

Well I went to that page and printed it so I woiuld know what to buy and what not to, but it printed out so small I can't see it lol... I wonder if any of you know the answer to this...I am a heart patient with diabetes,  Will the calcium be bad for me?   Love  Jerri

I remember you posting to me of your various other problems including diabetes and hypertension.  Are your numbers normal?  I am sure your body is trying to right itself (including your blood sugars).  I would check to make sure these are okay too.  Just a thought.Chuck
Yes, my sugar is good, don't know about the blood pressure...probably not I am supprised at the sugar, since stress raises them both.

I have to say that i did have some confusion too...Hard to explain..My Doc was Lortab..But i can remember having to stop and think for a sec before doing very simple things...It did go away, but took time like everything else..Congrats on day 17r2r

Hang in there, it will start to improve soon. Everytime I tried to quit it was always 3 weeks sick as a dog. I couldn't do it without Suboxone but that's not to say you can't. 17 days is a long time, the physical w/d is over, this is the mental part and you can get through it!!!

You're bring back memories!  I seemed to develop severe ADD in the stage you're in now.  I also couldn't remember what I was doing just 5 minutes ago!  I figured I just fried my brain.  I felt so mentally handicapped.I also remember the pain I experienced on days 7 & 8, then again on 16 & 17 for some reason.  Day 17 was a distance from physical w/d's but it was there full blown.Just to let you know, it's normal what you're going through.

question: I am on day 17 from dilaudid.  Not too many people here answer about that drug..but I kinda feel like most wd is all the same...anyway that is part of the problem...I can't think straight, I ramble, I get confused...yesterday I could not remeber how to turn on the computer and just sat there for a few seconds.  Most of my physical symptons left yesterday, but my ribs and other muscles are sore from the 15 days of shaking badly....I don't want a pill...I just am a little afraid of this confusion and thinking thing.  Love  Jerri
title: Is this normal in WD?
